Class ec.e.file.EFileEditor 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class ec.e.file.EFileEditor 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.file.EFileReader
           |
           +----ec.e.file.EFileEditor
public class EFileEditor
extends EFileReader
implements DataOutput
A capability class providing read/write access to a file. Wraps Java's RandomAccessFile class by only providing read and write access while withholding the power to open a file. Also deals with quakes by holding onto the file via a tether.

write(byte[])
Writes buf.length bytes from the specified byte array to this file.
write(byte[], int, int)
Writes length bytes from the specified byte array starting at offset to this file.
write(int)
Writes the specified byte to this file.
writeBoolean(boolean)
Writes a boolean to the file as a one-byte value, by calling the file's corresponding writeBoolean() method.
writeByte(int)
Writes out a byte to the file as a one-byte value, by calling the file's corresponding writeByte() method.
writeBytes(String)
Writes out the string to the file as a sequence of bytes, by calling the file's corresponding writeBytes() method.
writeChar(int)
Writes out a char to the file as a two-byte value, by calling the file's corresponding writeChar() method.
writeChars(String)
Writes a string to the file as a sequence of characters, by calling the file's corresponding writeChars() method.
writeDouble(double)
Writes out a double to the file as an eight-byte value, by calling the file's corresponding writeDouble() method.
writeFloat(float)
Writes out a float to the file as a four-byte value, by calling the file's corresponding writeFloat() method.
writeInt(int)
Writes out an int to the file as a four-byte value, by calling the file's correspoding writeInt() method.
writeLong(long)
Writes out a long to the file as an eight-byte value, by calling the file's corresponding writeLong() method.
writeShort(int)
Writes out a short to the file as a two-byte value, by calling the file's corresponding writeShort() method.
writeUTF(String)
Writes out a string to the file using UTF-8 encoding, by calling the file's corresponding writeUTF() method.

write 
  public void write(int b) throws IOException
Writes the specified byte to this file.
Parameters:
b - The byte to be written.
write 
  public void write(byte buf[]) throws IOException
Writes buf.length bytes from the specified byte array to this file.
Parameters:
buf - The bytes to be written.
write 
  public void write(byte buf[],
                    int offset,
                    int length) throws IOException
Writes length bytes from the specified byte array starting at offset to this file.
Parameters:
buf - The bytes to be written.
offset - The start offset (in buf) of the data.
length - The number of bytes to be written.

Writes a boolean to the file as a one-byte value, by calling the file's corresponding writeBoolean() method.
Parameters:
v - A boolean value to be written.
